remarks: Induction on the upper set of integers that starts at an integer ` M ` , using explicit substitution.  The hypotheses are the basis and the induction step.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Nov-2005.)
statement:
uzind4s.1 $e |- ( M e. ZZ -> [. M / k ]. ph ) $.
uzind4s.2 $e |- ( k e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> ( ph -> [. ( k + 1 ) / k ]. ph ) ) $.
uzind4s $p |- ( N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) -> [. N / k ]. ph ) $.
$d M k $.
